name: Differences Arena: Spot It
description:
Can you solve hundreds of DIFFERENCES and HIDDEN OBJECTS puzzles quickly and beat your opponents?

Test your observational and visual skills to another level with Differences Arena: Spot It. Challenge yourself and be the one to stand against battles with AIs and other players.

Compare two highly identical photos and spot 5 differences or more with easy points and clicks. This game is inspired from the classic puzzle game “Find the Difference” and is now given a new twist to make it more fun and challenging!

Feature:

~ Explore gorgeous sceneries and stunning graphics!
~ Compare two highly identical photos and spot the 5 differences with easy points and clicks.
~ Play up to 300 levels of spot-the-difference puzzle games for free!
~ Experience a variety of game modes as you progress through the game: hidden objects, night modes, gray mode, turn mode, and AI battles.
~ Look into the teeny-tiny details with the zooming feature!
~ Regular updates with loads of new content!

Get your gear on and prepare to find them all in the differences arena!



While Differences: Spot Them All is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings.
